text:
we have contacts with a "SPID" field and an associated company with the same "SPID" field
each company only has one primary contact
ideally we'd have the company and the contact both use the SPID as their record ID

I think Airflow can manage this. Iâ€™ve done a bi-directional Salesforce <> HubSpot synch using Pipedream as middleware but if I will try something of the nature again, I will look into building a proper data pipeline in Airflow.
